name: unweighted
content:
unweighted adjective
(STATISTICS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unweighted set of numbers has not been changed in a way that gives extra importance to particular information: All of the figures in the table are unweighted averages. My calculation is based on a crude, unweighted average of the cost of some grocery items.
More examplesFewer examplesThe figure in Column C is calculated by taking the unweighted sum of the figures in Columns A and B.In an unweighted share index, a price change in any of the stocks has an equal impact on the overall value of the index.His unweighted grade point average was good enough for him to be accepted at Princeton.

unweighted adjective
(OBJECT)
An unweighted object does not have something heavy fastened to it: The unweighted bundle bobbed up and down on the surface of the water. I started by lifting an unweighted bar. Related word
weighted
